#include <iostream>
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll a[21],i;
	a[0]=1;
	
	for(i=1;i<=20;i++)
	a[i]=i*(a[i-1]);
	
	
	
	ll t,n,ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			{
				ans+=a[n]/a[i];
			}
			else
			{
			    ans-=a[n]/a[i];	
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
